https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/jHTdCyHtCE0uqAUSZBw3V1o6V81.jpg In-gi had to abandon his dreams of becoming a serious director in order to pay off his parents' debts so to make quick money, he began to direct soft porn movies. But his dream of making a masterpiece has not died yet. A Masterpiece in My Life
